html: he shall not look to the altars…or the images. Altars, groves, and images refer to the Canaanite religion and its temples (Ex. 34:13). The groves were poles or trees or stone pillars erected near the Canaanite temple's altar in honor of Ashera, a Canaanite female deity, and Baal, a Canaanite male deity. Some of the Israelites who survive the prophesied calamities will turn from their idols and return to God.
